author: Universal Pictures
description:
Roy Miller (Matt Damon) takes out an enemy. 

Buy/Rent Green Zone!
Apple TV: https://tv.apple.com/us/movie/green-zone/umc.cmc.6q22y2gw6lbh3q1zdfrp9x54q

Microsoft: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/search/shop/movies?q=Green%20Zone
Universal Pictures Home Entertainment: https://www.uphe.com/movies/green-zone

Set during the early days of the Iraq War, Green Zone follows U.S. Army officer Roy Miller (Matt Damon) as he uncovers a tangled web of deception behind the hunt for WMDs. Fast, tense, and grounded in real-world stakes, this is a war thriller with something to say.

© 2010 Universal Studios. All Rights Reserved.
Cast: Matt Damon, Jason Isaacs, Greg Kinnear 
Produced By: Tim Bevan 
Directed By: Paul Greengrass 

#MattDamon #GreenZone #RoyMiller #UniversalPictures
title: Sniper Down🎯 #GreenZone #Shorts

author: Universal Pictures
description: Daniel Birt didn’t rush his path, he built it! As the Set Decorator on How to Train Your Dragon he crafts cinematic worlds with care, creativity, and a serious eye for detail. See Daniel’s work on the big screen and catch How to Train Your Dragon is in theaters now! #httydragon
title: My Universal Story: Daniel Birt | How to Train Your Dragon

author: Universal Pictures
description:
From Jurassic super fan to director of the franchise’s latest installment, Gareth Edwards joins Jacqueline Coley to talk about his latest movie, Jurassic World Rebirth. He reflects on his path—from creating the VFX shots himself in the film Monsters, to directing Rogue One, to taking on Spielberg’s legacy of bringing the large-scale spectacle of dinosaurs to the big screen.

Gareth talks paying homage to his predecessors (from Jaws to Jurassic), why he was literally watching grass grow on set, and what it was like working with fellow Jurassic superfan Scarlett Johansson - along with the entire all-star cast of Mahershala Ali and Jonathan Bailey.

Gareth reflects on the relevance of location based shooting, practical world building, why a healthy fear of tennis balls could come in handy and what it means to honor Jurassic lore, while making something new for the next generation.

Jurassic World Rebirth is in theaters July 2.

Follow and listen to Seen on the Screen with Jacqueline Cole
title: Jurassic World Rebirth with Director Gareth Edwards | Seen on the Screen with Jacqueline Coley
